```{r include = FALSE}
# Load Data
cc_hs_final = read.csv('/Users/mayracoronadogarcia/Documents/Practicum/Data Analysis/cc_hs_final.csv')

# Load Function
source("/Users/mayracoronadogarcia/Documents/Practicum/Data Analysis/Trend_Analysis_Function.R")

# Run Function
hkcs.results = hkcs.trend.analysis(
  hkcs.data = cc_hs_final,
  hkcs.strata = "SchoolID",
  hkcs.cluster = "CLASSID",
  hkcs.weight = "Wt_School",
  prefix = "QN_"
)
```

## Summary Statistics

```{r echo=FALSE}
library("knitr")
library("kableExtra")
kable(hkcs.results, "latex", longtable = T, booktabs = T)%>%
kable_styling(latex_options = c("striped", "HOLD_position",
                                "repeat_header"), full_width = T)
```
